round 1 4/6 www mipithelabel com mipi lace section 1 lace section 1 if following the charts knit rounds 1-8 a total of 3 times knit 1 round next work either the stockinette our sample or eyelet detail continue to lace section 2 if following the written pattern repeat of 8 sts round 1 k4 yo k1 ssk k1 round 2 knit round 3 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo k1 ssk round 4 knit round 5 yo k1 ssk k5 round 6 knit round 7 k1 yo k1 ssk k1 k2tog k1 yo round 8 knit repeat round 1-8 two more times knit 1 round next work either the stockinette our sample or eyelet detail continue to lace section 2 lace section 2 lace section 2 if following the charts knit rounds 1-12 a total of two times knit 1 round next work either the stockinette our sample or eyelet detail continue to lace section 3 if following the written pattern repeat of 8 sts round 1 p1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk p2 round 2 knit round 3 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk p1 round 4 knit round 5 k1 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k1 p1 round 6 knit round 7 yo ssk k3 k2tog yo p1 round 8 knit round 9 k1 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k1 p1 round 10 knit round 11 yo ssk k3 k2tog yo p1 round 12 knit repeat round 1-12 one more time knit 1 round next work either the stockinette our sample or eyelet detail continue to lace section 3 lace section 3 lace section 3 if following the charts knit rounds 1-8 a total of three times knit 1 round continue to end if following the written pattern repeat of 8 sts round 1 & 2 knit round 3 k1 yo k2 cdd k2 yo round 4 knit round 5 as round 3 round 6 7 8 knit repeat round 1-8 two more times knit 1 round continue to end 5/6 www mipithelabel com mipi end round 1 purl round 2 purl bobble all sts purlwise finishing weave in ends block the skirt to final or desired measurements and enjoy #lanalaceyskirt abbreviations bobble | bind off bor | beginning of round ccd | centered double decrease = slip the two first stitches together as if to knit k1 slip the two stitches over the knitted stitch co | cast on k | knit k2tog | knit 2 stitches together m | marker p | purl pm | place marker skpo | slip 1 stitch as if to knit k1 slip the slipped stitch over the knitted st sl | slip ssk | slip 2 stitches as if to knit knit together through the back loop by
